title: Why hasn't anyone chosen Titanic Hydra at worlds?
body: It explains my question in the title, but I'm perplexed by this... it is because the pro players are inexperienced with this item, or is it because it might be banned from worlds because it COULD be considered unbalanced, or maybe simply banned bc riot doesnt want anyone to know how OP it is and doesnt want people to play it and it become meta? i dont know, whats your guys opinions on it?

replies.body:
its not an op item

and it costs a shit ton
I thought Darius' got titanic hydra at worlds?

Because on most of the champions that want Tiamat, they want the lifesteal that comes from Hydra over the extra Tank stats.

Pretty simple honestly.

Be-because.... they.... dont..... want.... to... build it?

Did you ever think of that?
